description: I think this is a great app because it's a simplified version of a matrix app. Simple interface, but most of the 'stuff' you'd need. Currently no voice/video yet, but chats with the best of them.
summary: Nice. Same look and feel as on Ubuntu Touch!

description: Great snap and chat app!! love it

Unable to sign up using the app. The UI has a bug where you have to go full screen to get it to recognize the "next" button. Unable to sign in. The screen just blinks like it's trying to log in and then... nothing!  What happened? Who knows! It does send a verification email, but when you go back to the client it says "No email found" when doing a password recovery. In some situations it says "Oops! Something went wrong.", then it never tells you the problem and you are left gussing. This thing is a hot mess! How did it get a perfect rating with all of these bugs!? It's garbage! This app needs to be removed.
summary: Very buggy. Unable to log in. Unable to get support. Garbage app!
